summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Montlake Boulevard from Montlake Boulevard to East Park Drive et al., in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt under Ordinance No. 23086, creating Local Improvement District No. 2249 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
